title: Postal Service: Sending Items (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Sending Items subcategory within Postal Service. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: I'll send a postcard to my friend.
cards.japanese: 葉書を友達に送ります。

cards.english: I wrote a letter to my friend.
cards.japanese: 友達に手紙を書きました。

cards.english: Yesterday I wrote a letter to my friend.
cards.romaji: Kino tomodachi ni tegami o kakimashita.
cards.japanese: 昨日友達に手紙を書きました。
